pageContext.claim: “The reason he got nothing: because the Dems are very strong in the Justice Department. I put in an attorney general that never took control of the Justice Department, Jeff Sessions. Never took control of the Justice Department.”
pageContext.analysis: Sessions, in a rare statement rebutting the president, said this claim was not true. As AG, Sessions recused himself from the Russia probe but has turned the department strongly rightward from the Obama years.
